name: The Status Bureau
description:
Vancouver's SEO + Digital Marketing Shop
 
We specialize in being awesome, getting results, and making your life easier. Our core services are:
 
SEO
Google Ads Management
Analytics
Great Communication + Reporting
 
We’ve been in business since 2006 and haven’t stopped getting better. The majority of our trusted partners use us for strategies regarding SEO and search engine marketing, but we run countless Facebook ad campaigns and manage dozens of other aspects of their digital marketing.
 
Why we’re good at SEO
 
Experience. After seeing 100’s of SEO projects in specific verticals we can simply apply our learnings to new clients that come on board.
 
Elbow grease. Sometimes outworking a competitor is the key to driving better rankings, sales and leads.
 
Technical proficiency. We crawl through code, see what Google sees, and understand every algorithm tweak made.
READ MORE...
